description: Say hello to the Swiss Army Knife of shorts. Lightweight and breathable, this performance pair can go back and forth between sport and everyday activities. Features an integrated liner and the BallPark Pouch, there's no better bet for the active multi-tasker. Sport 2 Life offers a clean, contemporary look.
name: Saxx Underwear Sport 2 Life 2n1 Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
